synopsis.text:
In the bustling city of Kobe, aspiring screenwriter Ryo Matsumoto finds himself entangled in a web of danger and mystery. After a series of unfortunate events, including a rejected manuscript and a near-death experience, Ryo's life takes a dramatic turn when he witnesses a murder. However, his claims are dismissed by the police due to the inexplicable disappearance of the victim's body. Refusing to be labeled as delusional, Ryo enlists the help of a private detective named Mochizuki to validate his story and ensure his safety.

As the plot thickens, Ryo crosses paths with a captivating woman named Yuki, who stumbles upon a cryptic letter hidden within Ryo's manuscript. This letter, addressed to a professor of antiquities, propels them into the heart of an illicit antique smuggling ring. With their lives on the line, Ryo and Yuki must navigate through high-speed chases, perilous encounters, and the looming threat of death.

In a twist of fate, Ryo is forced to transform from a struggling writer to the action hero he's always penned, blurring the lines between his reality and the stories he creates. Will Ryo rise to the occasion and emerge as the hero, or will he become another casualty in this deadly game? Only time will tell in this thrilling anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
